Our Story

Both passionate about design, Isabelle and Jason found themselves working together during their studies in university. They soon discovered their connection ran deeper than they could have imagined. Since then...

  • The couple listened to and understood each other's values, establishing faith in one another
  • A promise was made to Isabelle, that Jason would stay by her through anything
  • Jason proposed to Isabelle and the two were happily engaged in Jan, 2024

Frequently Asked Questions

Answers to the most frequently asked questions.

The wedding will be on February 16th, 2025. We'll be aceepting guests at 1pm EST at The Venue at 100 Lane Street, Paramus, NJ.

While there are no strict requirements, we recommend a standard suit and tie outfit for men. For women, we recommend your favorite dress or formal wear.

We kindly ask that you abide by our invitation list given the time and effort being put into this event. If however, you do feel we have made a mistake and forgotten someone vital, we would be happy to have you let us know. You can email jasondipopolo@pm.me.

It wouldn't be a party without them. In our invitations, we have made certain to include the children of all family's invited.

Please be sure to RSVP by June 1st, 2025 to allow Isabelle and Jason to confidently include you in their special day.

Upon filling out your RSVP, you will be able to communicate to us any dietary restrictions you or your family have. We will do our best to accomodate you.

For those wishing to give to the bride and groom, we will have a gift table and card box available at the wedding party. Feel free to hold onto your gifts until then to best ensure no one has to carry around gifts longer than they have to and nothing is accidentally misplaced.

In the event of poor weather conditions, we will continue to hold the event indoors. If the weather shows signs of danger, we will be in communication with all who have confirmed attendance to the event.

If you or someone in your party cannot attend, please contact us to let us know as soon as possible. You can do so by emailing jasondipopolo@pm.me.

For any of our out-of-town guests, we recommend staying nearby at the Hampton Inn (Paramus).

Contact us with any inquiries related to the event at jasondipopolo@pm.me.
